description:
The family is back in Kochi for New Years break. The children are so excited for their otoshidama. Seeing this, Dad begins to tease them.; Mom`s brother and Dad go to teach the kids badminton, for fun, but it turns into a big competition between them so the kids wander off...; The family goes to a mochi making competition. Dad and Bunji enter the contest while Mom and Fumi help sell things. As soon as they start selling, the men rush in.; Bored with the New Year`s food, Mom begins to cook something that her father used to always make her just using flour and sugar.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: New Year`s Day / Japanese Badminton / Mochi is Delicious / Tastes Horrible
元旦 / はねつき / モチうまいね / マズイ
